sentences.english: As I see it, we can't even afford to have him arrested or accused.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，要是他被捕或受到起訴，那咱就受不了。

sentences.english: Liang Xin, you say we this how do one million consumption.
sentences.chinese: 良欣，你說咱這一百萬咋消費了。

sentences.english: Don't worry. It's a racing snail.
sentences.chinese: 不用麻煩，咱蝸牛速度賽過極品飛車。

sentences.english: Oh, but please, for now, our magic trick.
sentences.chinese: 啊，但是現在嘛，爲了咱這魔術表演。

sentences.english: Zheng Tou, great boon not the speech thank, we laud you.
sentences.chinese: 鄭頭，大恩不言謝，咱感激你。

sentences.english: You're moving one way and I'm planning my way.
sentences.chinese: 你明修棧道我暗渡陳倉咱各顯其能。

sentences.english: I will buy one after I come back.
In my fury, I dashed all the dishes to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 憤慨之下，咱把所有得杯盤都摔到地上去拉。

sentences.english: You are a shark of the first order, Euripides. So much the better for the firm!
sentences.chinese: 你可算得是第一流的奸商，這也是咱公司的造化。

sentences.english: It is a privilege to be speaking to you today.
sentences.chinese: 今天能跟你談話真是咱三生有幸。

sentences.english: Be away from duties without the of a superior officer.
sentences.chinese: 軍人咱未獲上級軍嘿允許的情麗下擅離職守。

sentences.english: Xin language, I feel our this foetus to be a son.
sentences.chinese: 昕語，我覺得咱這胎一定是兒子。
